issue.message: To get local formatting use `getDateInstance()`, `getDateTimeInstance()`, or `getTimeInstance()`, or use `new SimpleDateFormat(String template, Locale locale)` with for example `Locale.US` for ASCII dates.

No orientation specified, and the default is horizontal. This is a common source of bugs when children are added dynamically.
"Excercise" is a common misspelling; did you mean "Exercise"?

Potentially insecure random numbers on Android 4.3 and older. Read https://android-developers.blogspot.com/2013/08/some-securerandom-thoughts.html for more info.

issue.message: Implementing a custom `X509TrustManager` is error-prone and likely to be insecure. It is likely to disable certificate validation altogether, and is non-trivial to implement correctly without calling Android's default implementation.
As of Android 12, `android:exported` must be set; use `true` to make the activity \ available to other apps, and `false` otherwise. For launcher activities, this should be set to `true`.
Google Play requires that apps target API level 33 or higher.

The image `ic_launcher.png` varies significantly in its density-independent (dip) size across the various density versions: drawable-hdpi/ic_launcher.png: 55x53 dp (82x80 px), drawable-mdpi/ic_launcher.png: 82x80 dp (82x80 px), drawable-xhdpi/ic_launcher.png: 41x40 dp (82x80 px), drawable-xxhdpi/ic_launcher.png: 27x27 dp (82x80 px)
The `ic_launcher.png` icon has identical contents in the following configuration folders: drawable-hdpi, drawable-mdpi, drawable-xhdpi, drawable-xxhdpi
